description: DAI is an Ethereum-based stablecoin whose issuance and development is managed by the Maker Protocol and MakerDAO. The price of DAI is soft-pegged to the U.S. dollar and is collateralized by a mix of other cryptocurrencies that are deposited into smart-contract vaults every time new DAI is minted.

en.description: DAI is an Ethereum-based stablecoin whose issuance and development is managed by the Maker Protocol and MakerDAO. es.description: DAI es una moneda estable basada en Ethereum cuya emisión y desarrollo están gestionados por Maker Protocol y MakerDAO. El precio de DAI está vinculado al dólar estadounidense y está garantizado por una combinación de otras criptomonedas que se depositan en vaults de contratos inteligentes cada vez que se acuña un nuevo DAI.
